Name: Lighton
About the game: Lighton is a Challenging Puzzle Game. The goal in each level is to assemble the circuit and turn on all the lights. 50 hand-crafted levels; A fun puzzle game (even for those who have no knowledge of electronic circuits); Made for Sokoban style lovers; At some levels, it is possible to set up the circuit in more than one way; If you make a short circuit on battery, it will explode. (Be careful).
Meta Title: Lighton: Jun 18, 2020, Waidy Andrade and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Lighton? Check out the release date (Jun 18, 2020), developer insights from Waidy Andrade, and a complete game summary.
